product_name: Sea to Summit Pocket Laundry Wash
long_description: Keep your clothes clean while traveling the world with the compact Sea To Summit Pocket Laundry Wash. Compact plastic case holds 50 thin leaves of soap; remove leaves with dry hands and dissolve in water to use as liquid soap. Soap is biodegradable and phosphate free. Soap has a light green tea fragrance. Use 4 - 5 leaves per wash. Compliant with TSA carry-on luggage regulations. Case measures 2.5 x 1.5 x 0.5 in.
short_description: Keep your clothes clean while traveling the world with the compact Sea To Summit Pocket Laundry Wash.
